topic: From mind reading to mind sharing: A study on neural correlates of cognitive and affective "Theory of Mind" and their applications to salesforce enhancement

topic: Coalition without trust: The intra-brain connectivity and inter-brain synchronization of herd behaviors in an economic bubble game
